scripts.build: npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && turbo run build --concurrency=12
scripts.dev:all:development: concurrently -n "API,ADMIN,CLIENT" -c "blue,green,yellow" "cd apps/api && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://dev-api.anyrent.shop NODE_ENV=development yarn dev" "cd apps/admin && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://dev-api.anyrent.shop NODE_ENV=development yarn dev" "cd apps/client && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://dev-api.anyrent.shop NODE_ENV=development yarn dev"
scripts.dev:all:production: concurrently -n "API,ADMIN,CLIENT" -c "blue,green,yellow" "cd apps/api && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://api.anyrent.shop NODE_ENV=production yarn dev" "cd apps/admin && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://api.anyrent.shop NODE_ENV=production yarn dev" "cd apps/client && NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://api.anyrent.shop NODE_ENV=production yarn dev"
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm -rf apps/*/dist && rm -rf .turbo
scripts.railway:setup: yarn railway:generate && yarn railway:migrate && yarn railway:seed
